About the Company: Arfin India Ltd incorporated in the year 1992. Arfin India is leading manufacturer, supplier and exporter of Aluminium Wire, Aluminium Wire Rod, Flipped Coil Aluminium Wire Rod, Aluminium Alloy Wire Rod, Ferro Alloy Product, Aluminium Stick, Aluminium Cube, Aluminium Shot, Aluminium Ingot and Aluminium Alloy Ingot. The company forayed itself as a prominent name in the Aluminum Recycling and Ferro Alloys segment in the year 2001.
